dt2.3:1.5.pli: maggasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.3:1.6.pli: Te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.3:2.1.pli: Nirodhasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.3:2.2.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.3:3.1.pli: Jīvitindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.3:3.2.pli: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.3:4.22.pli: kammabhavena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.3:4.23.pli: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.3:5.4.pli: jhānena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.3:5.5.pli: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.3:6.19.pli: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.3:6.20.pli: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.3:6.21.pli: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.3:7.2.pli: asaṅkhatehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.3:7.3.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.3:8.2.pli: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.3:8.3.pli: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …

dt2.3:8.4.pli: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.3:9.7.pli: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …

dt2.3:9.8.pli: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.3:10.6.pli: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.3:10.7.pli: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.3:11.2.pli: cittānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …pe…

dt2.3:11.3.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.3:12.3.pli: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.3:12.4.pli: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.3:12.5.pli: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.3:12.6.pli: Te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.4:1.2.pli: maggasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.4:1.3.pli: Te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.4:5.2.pli: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.4:5.3.pli: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.4:5.13.pli: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.4:5.14.pli: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.4:5.15.pli: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?

dt2.4:5.16.pli: Te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.

dt2.5:1.1.pli: Rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?

dt2.5:1.2.pli: Te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:2.3.pli: saṅkhārakkhandhena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:2.4.pli: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:3.6.pli: manindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:3.7.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:4.4.pli: phoṭṭhabbadhātuyā ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:4.5.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:5.5.pli: jīvitindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:5.6.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:6.3.pli: nirodhasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:6.4.pli: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:7.2.pli: kāyindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:7.3.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:8.15.pli: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:8.16.pli: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:9.1.pli: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:9.2.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:10.1.pli: Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:10.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:11.1.pli: Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:11.2.pli: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:12.5.pli: kammabhavena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:12.6.pli: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:13.4.pli: iddhipādena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:13.5.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:14.5.pli: maraṇena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:14.6.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:15.1.pli: Paridevena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:15.2.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:16.18.pli: manasikārena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:16.19.pli: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:17.1.pli: Cittena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:17.2.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:19.1.pli: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.5:19.2.pli: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.5:19.3.pli: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā ….

dt2.5:35.3.pli: ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:35.4.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:36.2.pli: anidassanasappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:36.3.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:37.2.pli: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.5:37.3.pli: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:37.4.pli: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:38.3.pli: sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.5:38.4.pli: hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.5:38.5.pli: na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:38.6.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:39.2.pli: asaṅkhatehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:39.3.pli: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:40.2.pli: sappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:40.3.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:41.1.pli: Rūpīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:41.2.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:42.2.pli: lokuttarehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:42.3.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:43.2.pli: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.5:43.3.pli: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:43.4.pli: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:44.3.pli: āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.5:44.4.pli: āsavavippayuttehi anāsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:44.5.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:45.7.pli: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:45.8.pli: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:46.4.pli: sārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:46.5.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:47.9.pli: upādādhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:47.10.pli: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:48.1.pli: Cittehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:48.2.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:49.6.pli: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:49.7.pli: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:50.1.pli: Ajjhattikehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:50.2.pli: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:51.3.pli: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.5:51.4.pli: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.5:51.5.pli: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā …pe…

dt2.5:51.6.pli: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.

dt2.5:52.4.pli: saṅkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.5:52.5.pli: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.5:52.24.pli: saraṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?

dt2.5:52.25.pli: Te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
